earned Earned Commissions
section.para: The earned commissions report is a stock commissions report, which gets replaced by a different report when the enhanced commissions package is installed. To view earned commissions, select the Earned Commissions option. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: To mark a commission as having been paid, use the Edit option on any of the Sales History or Bookings screens.

section.para: When displaying earned commissions, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display earned commissions for all sales representatives.
Specify sales representative whose earned commissions you want to display.
Earned commissions occurring on or after this date will display.
Earned commissions occurring on or before this date will display.
Select to include miscellaneous charges and miscellaneous items in the display.
